import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function SingleProduct() { const { id } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // Fetch data for the specific product using the id const fetchData = async () => { try { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/products/${id}`); const productData = await response.json(); setProduct(productData); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching product data:", error); } }; fetchData(); }, [id]); if (!product) { return
